general: This morning, the moon in Virgo harmonizes with Jupiter, expanding your heart and mind, dear Taurus. Embrace this moment to reflect on the ideas and emotional changes that arise upon your awakening. This afternoon, a rare configuration between the Moon, Venus, and Chiron will allow you to refine your projects in complete intimacy. Be aware of the necessary adjustments to achieve your personal goals. In the evening, Uranus encourages you to play with your image and put yourself forward, but be cautious to remain vigilant in the face of unknown situations, as Saturn may create tensions.
love: Express your emotions authentically, as it will strengthen your bonds.
work: Take the time to fine-tune your projects before sharing them.
health: Listen to your body and give it the rest it needs.
advice: Be open to changes, even unexpected ones.
teaser: A day of transformation and opportunities!
